overview:
Technically sophisticated software engineering professional offering a deep background in .NET programming. In-depth expertise in the design, development and testing of sophisticated, multi-tier applications and components. In-depth experience performing all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). Proven capacity for interfacing with all levels of management and technical expertise. World-class client and vendor relationship management talents. Specialties:

VB.NET, C#, ASP.NET, .NET Framework1.1/2.0/3.5, Java Script, C++, XML, XHTML, DHTML, CSS, XML Schema, XSLT, T-SQL, PL/SQL, ASP, VBScript, PHP, JAVA, Visual Basic, ActiveX/DCOM, SOAP, AJAX, Google search API, DotNetNukeÂ®, Agile Software Development, Windows Media Services, Windows Media Encoder, MS SQL Server 2000/2005/2008, Vignette Content Management
